Package com.athgri.finalproject.daoService

Class UserSessionService

java.lang.Object
com.athgri.finalproject.daoService.UserSessionService
@Service public class UserSessionService extends Object
The UserSessionService class provides services related to user sessions.

    • deleteUserSession

      public boolean deleteUserSession(Long id)
      Deletes a user session by its unique identifier.
      Parameters:
      id - the unique identifier of the user session to delete
      Returns:
      true if the user session is successfully deleted, false otherwise
